current.template:
#! /bin/bash
# https://sqoop.apache.org/docs/1.4.0-incubating/SqoopUserGuide.html
# This script fetch the selected tables
driver=mysql
ip="mysql-db.1000genomes.org"
username="anonymous"
password=""
database="homo_sapiens_core_60_36p"
hdfsdest=/user/hdfs/genomes

beeline -u $IMPALA_URL -e "CREATE DATABASE genome;"

sqoop  import-all-tables  --connect jdbc:$driver://$ip:4272/$database --username $username --as-textfile -m 1 --warehouse-dir $hdfsdest --delete --hive-import --hive-database genome --append

beeline -u $IMPALA_URL -e "INVALIDATE METADATA;"

current.template:
#!/bin/bash

ping -c 1 dn1.p4.saagie.prod.saagie.io
ping -c 1 dn2.p4.saagie.prod.saagie.io
ping -c 1 dn3.p4.saagie.prod.saagie.io
ping -c 1 dn1
ping -c 1 dn2
ping -c 1 dn3

exit 0

echo "Bash version ${BASH_VERSION}..."

cd /tmp

echo "Get Countries..."
curl -O https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bbonnin/datasets/master/WorldDevIndicators/Country.csv

echo "Get Series..."
curl -O https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bbonnin/datasets/master/WorldDevIndicators/Series.csv.zip

unzip Series.csv.zip

for i in 1 2 3
do
  echo "Get Indicators_part$i..."
  curl -O https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bbonnin/datasets/master/WorldDevIndicators/Indicators_part$i.csv.zip
  unzip Indicators_part$i.csv.zip
done

cat Indicators_part1.csv Indicators_part2.csv Indicators_part3.csv > Indicators.csv

hdfs dfs -put -f Country.csv /user/hdfs/wdi/
hdfs dfs -put -f Series.csv /user/hdfs/wdi/
hdfs dfs -put -f Indicators.csv /user/hdfs/wdi/

rm Country.csv
rm Series.csv*
rm Indicators*.csv

#!/bin/bash

sales_path=/data/sales-forecast

# Cleaning
hdfs dfs -rm -r $sales_path
hdfs dfs -mkdir -p $sales_path

# Get data
wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bbonnin/datasets/master/FRED/S4248SM144NCEN.csv -O /tmp/S4248SM144NCEN.csv
hdfs dfs -put /tmp/S4248SM144NCEN.csv $sales_path

# Create table in Hive
beeline -u $HIVE_URL -e "DROP TABLE sales.beverages;"
beeline -u $HIVE_URL -e "DROP TABLE IF EXISTS sales.b_temp;"
beeline -u $HIVE_URL -e "DROP DATABASE sales;"

beeline -u $HIVE_URL -e "CREATE DATABASE sales;"

beeline -u $HIVE_URL -e "CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE sales.b_temp (\
  date DATE, total INT) \
  ROW FORMAT DELIMITED FIELDS TERMINATED BY ',' \
  LOCATION 'hdfs://cluster/data/sales-forecast/' \
  TBLPROPERTIES ('skip.header.line.count'='1'); \
"

beeline -u $HIVE_URL -e "CREATE TABLE sales.beverages AS SELECT to_utc_timestamp(concat(date, ' 00:00:00'), 'GMT') AS date, total FROM sales.b_temp;"

beeline -u $IMPALA_URL -e "INVALIDATE METADATA"

#!/bin/bash

# Source: https://blog.twineworks.com/converting-a-mysql-dump-to-csv-files-b5e92d7cc5dd

echo "Recuperation des data de la base de données..."
hdfs dfs -get /user/bruno.bonnin/nfm/ntu078_tbm3_export_to_db_full_19-03-2018.zip
unzip ntu078_tbm3_export_to_db_full_19-03-2018.zip

# Conversion en csv
hdfs dfs -get /user/bruno.bonnin/nfm/split.awk
sed -i 's/\r//' ntu078_tbm3_export_to_db_full_19-03-2018.sql
cat ntu078_tbm3_export_to_db_full_19-03-2018.sql | gawk -f split.awk

echo "Un peu de nettoyage..."
sed -i  's/'"'"'//g' export_to_db.csv

echo "Deploiement du fichier dans le lac..."
hdfs dfs -put -f export_to_db.csv /user/bruno.bonnin/nfm/data

rm -f ntu078_tbm3_export_to_db_full_19-03-2018.zip
rm -f export_to_db*

current.template:
#!/bin/bash

sales_path=/axel.augey/axa

# Cleaning
hdfs dfs -rm -r $sales_path
hdfs dfs -mkdir -p $sales_path/data

# Get data
wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bbonnin/datasets/master/FRED/S4248SM144NCEN.csv -O /tmp/S4248SM144NCEN.csv
hdfs dfs -put /tmp/S4248SM144NCEN.csv $sales_path/data

# Create table in Hive
beeline -u $HIVE_URL -e "DROP TABLE sales.beverages;"
beeline -u $HIVE_URL -e "DROP TABLE IF EXISTS sales.b_temp;"
beeline -u $HIVE_URL -e "DROP DATABASE sales;"

beeline -u $HIVE_URL -e "CREATE DATABASE sales;"

beeline -u $HIVE_URL -e "CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE sales.b_temp (\
  date DATE, total INT) \
  ROW FORMAT DELIMITED FIELDS TERMINATED BY ',' \
  LOCATION 'hdfs://cluster/tmp/sales-forecast/data/' \
  TBLPROPERTIES ('skip.header.line.count'='1'); \
"

beeline -u $HIVE_URL -e "CREATE TABLE sales.beverages AS SELECT to_utc_timestamp(concat(date, ' 00:00:00'), 'GMT') AS date, total FROM sales.b_temp;"

beeline -u $IMPALA_URL -e "INVALIDATE METADATA"
